::Battera::

She smiled, glad to hear that he wasn't going to kill her.
"I won't give you a reason. Are you the leader of the maximal group?"
She still waasn't sure about this one.  At least he wasn't in a hurry 
to get rid of her, yet.  
"I'm here to try to help initiate peace talks.  My friends and I are 
asking all the leaders to our embassy so that they might meet face to 
face and talk about creating peace between the Predacons and the 
Maximals." She looked down for a moment. "It's not easy. But that is 
the goal, to create a lasting peace."
She just stood there looking at Firearm.  She hoped that he would 
believe her. Right now, she was looking for all the allies she could 
get.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm smiles, seeing that this bot had her head on straight (not 
wanting to 
> be killed).
> 
> "I'm Firearm, nice to meet you," he says in a cheery tone, noticing 
that she 
> was looking at his arm cannon, "That's kinda unremovable. Don't 
worry, 
> though, I won't use it."
> 
> He grins at her, "Unless you give me a reason to."
